column4: i have a router and iam on ubuntu, but my internet speed is really slow for some reason iam not using my torrent client anything like that do i need to install a firewall to speed up my machine coz i might have malware or something in my system ? it was working fine all last 3 weeks
and malware and viruses are very rare if not non existent on linux
yeah but it would stop wat ever is causing it to slow down
thats wat i read and it can read it but wont execute it .
